languages.text: "Когитаторные системы этого храма Омниссии подчинены оболочке, чьим вместилищем служит машина перед нами. Машина, сотворенная для вашей предшественницы и использующая в своих исчислениях биологические сигнатуры из династической крови. Духи должны распознать влады{mf|ку|чицу} судна и подчиниться {mf|его|ее} воле. Должны". {n}Последнее слово Паскаль произносит с легкой дрожью.{/n}

"The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Когитаторные системы этого храма Омниссии подчинены оболочке, чьим вместилищем служит машина перед нами. Машина, сотворенная для вашей предшественницы и использующая в своих исчислениях биологические сигнатуры из династической крови. Духи должны распознать влады{mf|ку|чицу} судна и подчиниться {mf|его|ее} воле. Должны". {n}Последнее слово Паскаль произносит с легкой дрожью.{/n}

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚这座神殿的沉思者隶属于机械框架，而框架的存储器听从我们面前这台机器的指挥。这台机器应该是你的先人所创造的，它的计算过程采用了王朝血统的生物特征。所有的机魂应该可以意识到谁是这艘船的主人，并服从于{mf|他|她}的意志。应该是这样。”{n}帕斯卡说出最后这句话时，他的合成声音微微颤抖着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚这座神殿的思考器隶属于机械框架，而框架的存储器听从我们面前这台机器的指挥。这台机器应该是你的先人所创造的，它的计算过程采用了王朝血统的生物特征。所有的机魂应该可以意识到谁是这艘船的主人，并服从于{mf|他|她}的意志。应该是这样。”{n}帕斯卡说出最后这句话时，他的合成声音微微颤抖着。{/n}

languages.text: 「この万機神の神殿の考算機システムはシェルに従属し、そのリポジトリには自分たちの目の前にあるマシンが格納されています。陛下の前任者のために作られた機械で、その計算には王朝の血の生体信号が使われています。精霊はこの船の主を認識し、その意志に従うはずです」{n}パスカルの合成音声がわずかに震えながら、最後の言葉を口にする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この万機神の神殿の考算機システムはシェルに従属し、そのリポジトリには私たちの目の前にあるマシンが格納されています。あなたの前任者のために作られた機械で、その計算には王朝の血の生体信号が使われています。精霊はこの船の{mf|主|主}を認識し、その意志に従うはずです」{n}パスカルの合成音声がわずかに震えながら、最後の言葉を口にする。{/n}
「この万機神の神殿の考算機システムはシェルに従属し、そのリポジトリには自分たちの目の前にあるマシンが格納されています。陛下の前任者のために作られた機械で、その計算には王朝の血の生体信号が使われています。精霊はこの船の主を認識し、その意志に従うはずです」{n}パスカルの合成音声がわずかに震えながら、最後の言葉を口にする。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Cogitator-Systeme dieses Tempels des Omnissiah unterstehen der Hülle, deren Speicher der Maschine dient, die wir hier vor uns sehen. Eine Maschine, die für Eure Vorgängerin gebaut wurde und bei ihren Berechnungen die biologischen Signaturen dynastischen Bluts einsetzt. Die Geister müssten {mf|den Herren|die Herrin} des Schiffs erkennen und sich {mf|seinem|ihrem} Willen unterwerfen. Müssten." {n}Das letzte Wort spricht Pasqal mit einem leichten Zittern in seiner künstlichen Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Cogitator-Systeme dieses Tempels des Omnissiah unterstehen der Hülle, deren Speicher der Maschine dient, die wir hier vor uns sehen. Eine Maschine, die für Eure Vorgängerin gebaut wurde und bei ihren Berechnungen die biologischen Signaturen dynastischen Bluts einsetzt. Die Geister müssten {mf|den Herren|die Herrin} des Schiffs erkennen und sich {mf|seinem|ihrem} Willen unterwerfen. Müssten." {n}Das letzte Wort spricht Pasqal mit einem leichten Zittern in seiner künstlichen Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: « Les cogitateurs de ce temple de l'Omnimessie sont assujettis à la structure dont les archives desservent la machine qui nous fait face. Une machine conçue pour votre prédécesseure, qui emploie les signatures biologiques du sang dynastique dans ses opérations. Les esprits devraient reconnaître {mf|le maître|la maîtresse} du vaisseau et se soumettre à sa volonté. Devraient. » {n}C'est avec un léger tressaillement dans sa voix synthétique que Pasqal répète ce dernier mot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les cogitateurs de ce temple de l'Omnimessie sont assujettis à la structure dont les archives desservent la machine qui nous fait face. Une machine conçue pour votre prédécesseure, qui emploie les signatures biologiques du sang dynastique dans ses opérations. Les esprits devraient reconnaître {mf|le maître|la maîtresse} du vaisseau et se soumettre à sa volonté. Devraient. » {n}C'est avec un léger tressaillement dans sa voix synthétique que Pasqal répète ce dernier mot.{/n}

languages.text: «Los sistemas de los cogitadores de este templo del Omnissiah están subordinados al armazón cuyo repositorio sirve a la máquina que tenemos frente a nosotros. Una máquina creada por su predecesora, que utiliza la firma biológica de la sangre dinástica en sus computaciones. Los espíritus deberían reconocer a{mf|l amo| la ama} de la nave y doblegarse a su voluntad. Deberían».{n}Pasqal pronuncia esa última palabra con un ligero temblor en su voz sintetizada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los sistemas de los cogitadores de este templo del Omnissiah están subordinados al armazón cuyo repositorio sirve a la máquina que tenemos frente a nosotros. Una máquina creada por su predecesora, que utiliza la firma biológica de la sangre dinástica en sus computaciones. Los espíritus deberían reconocer a{mf|l amo| la ama} de la nave y doblegarse a su voluntad. Deberían».{n}Pasqal pronuncia esa última palabra con un ligero temblor en su voz sintetizada.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu Hermesih tapınağındaki kavramsayarlar, veri havuzunun önümüzde duran makineyi beslediği kabuğun birer alt sistemleridir. Bu makine, selefiniz için yaratıldı ve bilgisayımında hanedanlık soyunun biyolojik imzalarını kullanıyor. Ruhlar, geminin efendisini tanıyıp ve onun iradesine boyun eğecektir. Eğmeleri gerek." {n}Pasqal bu son sözcüğü, sentezlenmiş sesindeki küçük bir titremeyle sarf ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The cogitator systems of this temple of the Omnissiah are subordinate to the shell whose repository serves the machine we see before us. A machine created for your predecessor and one that uses the biological signatures of dynastic blood in its computations. The spirits should recognise the ship's {mf|master|mistress} and submit to {mf|his|her} will. Should." {n}Pasqal speaks the final word with a slight tremor in his synthesised voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu Hermesih tapınağındaki kavramsayar sistemleri, veri havuzu önümüzde gördüğümüz bu makineye hizmet eden gövdenin birer alt sistemidirler. Öncüllerin için yaratılmış ve hesaplamalarında hanedanlık soyunun biyolojik imzalarını kullanan makineye... Ruhlar geminin efendisinin kim olduğunun farkındadırlar ve onun iradesine göre hareket ederler. En azından etmeliler." {n}Pasqal bu son sözcüğü, sentezlenmiş sesindeki küçük bir titremeyle sarf ediyor.{/n}
